devfest-description.message: The biggest Google tech conference in Paris carefully crafted for you by GDG community! All about Android, Web and Cloud from the world experts

devfest-think.message: Think out of the box. Create what you want!

view-more-pictures.message: Click here to view more pictures

tickets-disclaimer.message: Tickets grant access to all conference sections, coffee breaks, lunch and party. Accommodation is NOT included in the ticket price.
